register(name: str, identifier: int, serviceClassObject)¶

Registers a new service class

Parameters:

  • name (str) – The name of the service as given in ServiceTypes

  • serviceClass (Derived Class Instances of ServiceBase) – The service class

  • kwargs (Any) – Parameters for service class
